name: GetBuildDefinitionVariableValueTask
friendlyName: Set variable in current build from another build
description: Get the current value of a specified build defintion variable and update a local build time variable to it.
author: Riccardo Viglianisi

inputs.name: builddefinitionid
inputs.label: Build definition ID.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the build definition containing the variable you wish to read the value of.

inputs.name: variable
inputs.label: Variable to read.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable in the specified definition you wish to get the value of

inputs.name: localVariable
inputs.label: Local Variable to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build variable in this definition you wish to use to store the value of the remote variable

inputs.name: usedefaultcreds
inputs.label: Use default credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will use the credentials of the running agent as opposed to access token provided by build service.
